means: 引体向上的，鼓舞士气的，提高士气的

sentence.Network_en: When her husband died, the woman had to keep her chin up for the sake of the children.
sentence.Network_cn: 丈夫死后, 那妇人为了她的孩子不得不鼓起生活的勇气.

sentence.Network_en: Keep your chin up and take another test.
Don't keep your shoulder too square, no chin up.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要让您的肩膀太平方米, 没有下巴了.

list.abs: 体育专业名词的翻译_百度知道 ... 指卧撑 = finger push up 引体向上 = chin up 支撑双臂屈伸 = dip.
口语小词:每天要说无数次的话,原来英语这么说 ... Leave me alone. 别理我。 Chin up. 振作些。 You never know. 世事难料。.
英语新... ... keep one's breath to cool one's porridge 多说无用 keep one's chin up 不气馁 keep one's countenance 镇定自若.
如何用英语鼓励别人-英语点津 ... Don't let us down. 不要让我们失望。 Keep your chin up. 不要气馁。 Keep it up. 坚持下去。.
... [字面意思] 儿子像父亲。 Like mother,like daughter. [字面意思] 抬起下巴颏。 Keep your chin up! 3.blood money 抚恤金.

means.word_mean: 1. an arm exercise performed by pulling yourself up on a horizontal bar until your chin is level with the bar
